addUniqueConstraint.columnNames: code, subscription_id, account_id, charge_template_id, service_template_id, offer_template_id, access_id, job_instance_id, provider_id

changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: update billing_billing_account set electronic_billing=false where electronic_billing is null

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update job_execution set job_instance_id = (select min(MEVEO_JOB_INSTANCE.id) from MEVEO_JOB_INSTANCE where MEVEO_JOB_INSTANCE.code=job_execution.job_name or MEVEO_JOB_INSTANCE.job_template=job_execution.job_name)
delete from job_execution where job_instance_id is null
